titles: The vvoefull crie of Rome Containing a defiance to popery. With Thomas Bells second challenge to all fauorites of that Romish faction. Succinctly comprehending much variety of matter ...
author: Bell, Thomas, fl. 1593-1610.
publisher: Printed by T[homas] C[reede] for William Welby, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Church-yard, at the signe of the Grayhound,
notes: The first leaf and the last leaf ar blank.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
